members.docComment:
/**
 * A React component that renders UI elements generated by an ai. It automatically sends the initial prompt and renders the assistant's response as React elements.
 *
 * @example
 * ```tsx
 * const MyUI = () => {
 *   return (
 *     <UiCompletion
 *       model="gpt-4"
 *       prompt="Create a list of profile cards for the users"
 *       tools={[
 *         createTool({
 *           name: 'get_users',
 *           description: 'Get the list of users',
 *           handler: () => users
 *         }),
 *       ]}
 *       components={[
 *         exposeComponent(ProfileCard, {
 *           name: 'ProfileCard',
 *           description: 'A component that displays a user information',
 *           props: {
 *             userId: s.string('The id of the user'),
 *           },
 *         }),
 *       ]}
 *     />
 *   );
 * };
 * ```
 *
 */
members.name: UiCompletion

docs.summary: A React component that renders UI elements generated by an ai. It automatically sends the initial prompt and renders the assistant's response as React elements.
